s.text: The deal, says the paper, was that the inspectors did this in return for getting worked-up information back from the NSA relevant to where and how Iraq was hiding evidence of its weapons programs.
The Washington Post big print stresses the likelihood of live testimony, particularly that of Monica Lewinsky.
A trial that will probably include live witnesses.
The New York Times headline dwells on the probability of a "full trial" leading to a vote on the two articles of impeachment.
